Text: RE Programming PST Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday January PM To QA Subject Programming Dear Mr Giron Thank you for your email Dish Network is committed to providing the best quality programming packages at affordable rates for our customers The packages have been setup in balance with cost effectiveness and consumer demand Unfortunately we were unable to reach an acceptable agreement with the provider of ESPN Classic for the continued carriage of this channel on Dish Network We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this issue and will gladly forward your requests to our Programming Department Per the Residential Customer Agreement all programming and prices are subject to change with or without notice We thank you for your input as we continually review our options in order to provide a compelling lineup for our viewers Please stay tuned for consumer Charlie Chats that are broadcast monthly on Channel or logon to our website for future programming announcements Your business is greatly appreciated and we thank you for allowing us to be of assistance to you If you have any further questions or concerns please refer to wwwdishnetworkcom or reply to this email and include all previous correspondence so that we may assist you promptly As a current customer you may also use our website to view your current or previous billing statements add services or make payments to your account Please use the link below to launch yourself to the most userfriendly Customer Support Center available today customercareUserManagementloginjs p customercareUserManagementloginj sp Sincerely Customer Care DISH Network Please include all original messages when replying ORIGINAL MESSAGE Full Name Darron Giron Account Number Question What happened to ESPN Classic
